messages.defaultWarn: This link is not verified and may share your browsing data with a third-party site. Make sure the destination is trustworthy before continuing.
messages.denyDefault: This domain is blocked. Proceed with caution.
messages.endpointUnavailable: Policy resolver temporarily unavailable. Proceed with caution.
messages.timeout: The request to verify this domain timed out. Proceed with caution.
messages.error: An error occurred while verifying this domain. Proceed with caution.
messages.missingHost: Host is missing from the request.

modal.title: Check that this link is safe
